mapper.update: UPDATE record SET total_count = #{totalCount}, total_km = #{totalKm}, average_pace = #{averagePace}, total_time = #{totalTime}, team_success_count = #{teamSuccessCount}, competition_success_count = #{competitionSuccessCount} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO race_info (race_id, user_id, velocity, km, time, heart_rate, kcal, success, polyline, date) VALUES (#{raceId}, #{userId}, #{velocity}, #{km}, #{time}, #{heartRate}, #{kcal}, #{success}, #{polyline},#{date})
mapper.select: SELECT ri.race_id, ri.user_id, r.mode, ri.time/ri.km as pace, ri.time, ri.km, ri.heart_rate, ri.kcal, ri.success, ri.polyline, ri.date FROM race_info ri JOIN race r ON r.id = ri.race_id WHERE ri.user_id = #{userId} AND ri.date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ORDER BY ri.date DESC
